attributes.action: Stop spending tax payers money on other countries when our own is in dire straits !!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People of this country are already taxed to the hilt.  They do not need to pay more tax so that Britain can be seen to be a leader in world events.  Charity begins at home.  We need to take care of our own British people first before looking at other nations, especially considering the debt we're already in.
